reference: Melee weapons include the knife, axe, mace and whip. Ranged weapons include the bow, shotgun, rifle and cannon.

input: Of the following measurements, which units relate to mass? Kilogram, microgram, pound, litre, year, kilometre and ounce.
reference: Kilogram (kg), microgram (μg), pound (lb), and ounce (oz) are all units of mass. Kilogram and microgram are units from the metric (SI) system. Pound and ounce are units from the imperial system. Litre is a unit of volume, year is a unit of time and kilometre is a unit of distance.
output_1: Units of mass include kilogram (kg), microgram (μg), pound (lb), and ounce (oz). Kilogram and microgram belong to the metric (SI) system, while pound and ounce are part of the imperial system. Litre measures volume, year measures time, and kilometre measures distance.
output_2: Kilogram (kg), microgram (μg), litre (L), and ounce (oz) are all units of mass. Kilogram and microgram are units from the metric (SI) system. Litre and ounce are units from the imperial system. Pound is a unit of volume, year is a unit of time and kilometre is a unit of distance.
output_1_str: Units of mass include kilogram (kg), microgram (μg), pound (lb), and ounce (oz). Kilogram and microgram belong to the metric (SI) system, while pound and ounce are part of the imperial system. Litre measures volume, year measures time, and kilometre measures distance. I am highly confident in this information.
